title: Events at the Belgian Coast at your fingertips
welcomeText: Sign up for free for intelligent tourist event recommendations tailored to you.
welcomeSmallText: At least one of the following data categories is needed to make recommendations among a large number of events.
page1: The time, duration and phone number of the calls you make can reveal your circle of friends and colleagues.
consent1: Yes, I agree that Proximus uses this call data information.
page2: Your smartphone and our GSM network allow to track your location.
consent2: Yes, I agree that Proximus uses my location data based on my smartphone.
page3: Your TV decoder generates viewing records that can be linked to the TV guide to determine topics of interest.
consent3: Yes, I agree that Proximus uses my TV viewing records.
page4: Your internet browsing behaviour can be mapped onto website interest categories.
consent4: Yes, I agree that Proximus uses the categories of websites I visited.
